attributes.action: To make it illegal for adults purchasing cigarettes for minors use.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It  may come as a shock to so many of you that there is NO law against  adults purchasing  cigarettes for minors, their own others . Some children as young as 12 years of age, just as an incentives to behave. We all are aware  of the dangers of smoking, so it would only make common scene to give children the same protection from irrespirable actions, as we have now in public places.
